#summary Current features of the engine.

List of currently implemented features:

 * Static main "Engine" class to hold all the information you could possible need within your game
 * Basic but powerful entity system included
 * Advanced parsing and caching of TiledMap map files (http://www.mapeditor.org/)
 * Collisions/Objects in the TiledMap are automatically parsed
 * Seamless transition between maps (possible to implement and add transition effects)
 * Camera with the posibility to track any entity and render effects, like a shake
 * Intelligent font builder which automatically creates a UnicodeFont object for every font file you include
